content:
I have recently graduated from IIT Kanpur in CSE. I would be joining MPI Brain Research Institute, Frankfurt as a visiting research scholar under Prof. Moritz Helmstaedter. Prior to this I was advised by Prof. Piyush Rai in my undergraduate studies.
My research interests include deep learning with a predilection for computer vision, Augmented Reality and Human Computer Interaction.

title: Varun Kumar Khare
